page.title: 11LEISURE TIME IN KNOTTING
page.content: About thirty adults and ten children live in Knotting. We discovered that only two adults and no children at all go to any clubs. In fact there are no village clubs in Knotting so the two adults go to a different village for entertainment. Most people stay at home or go to Luton for entertainment. Because no children go to clubs they either go out to play or watch television. Most children watch television for l-2 hours per night. Three adults watch television 5-l0 hours per week. Ten adults go to church and two children go to Sunday school. Ten adults watch television for 3-4 hours and six for 8 hours.
